message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product for $100. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and quality.
